magic paths [mpath]: E1 R9
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Throughout Agartha sacred engravings covers the cavern walls. Carved by the sacred order of Engravers since the time of the sealing of the Forbidden Chamber, these patterns are supposed to be oracular. They are interpreted by the Earth Readers. The Engravers are earth mages of limited skills, but their engravings reveal magical as well as oracular secrets.
